name: Ghost Migration
description:
Ghost Migration

'Tis All Hallows' Eve
and all through the mists
the ghosts are migrating
if you believe they exist

they've worked all year long
but now return to their lair
as they've boo'd their last boo
and scare'd their last scare

will you see them again?
...have you seen them before?
will they ever come back?
...and will there be more??

well, you shouldn't worry
there's no need to cry
as one day you too
will be a ghost, when you die

you'll join the ghost ranks
and take your ghost station
and give your ghost thanks
for the Great Ghost Migration

Made for the Spooky Screensaver Jam by Team Dogpit!
